name: Polaroid #1
description: It looks like a picture of this house, from the street. There's a tree you recognize from the front yard, but it's a lot smaller in this picture.

verbInteractions.Look at: It looks like a picture of this house, from the street. There's a tree you recognize from the front yard, but it's a lot smaller in this picture.
verbInteractions.Take/Pick up: You'll hold onto the Polaroid for now.
verbInteractions.Flip: There's a number 9 on the back.
